thread.title: Wonderful experience for 9 days.
thread.title_full: Wonderful experience for 9 days. - Review of The Royal Park - A Roseate House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Edward S
title: Wonderful experience for 9 days.
text:
We stayed here for 9 days in March 2017 and could not be happier with our stay. This is a small boutique hotel with very personal service. The staff was very friendly and accommodating. It is a short walk to Hyde Park and nearby moderately priced restaurants. It is 3 blocks walk to Paddington Station.
The continental breakfast was included with our room. It included cold cereals, yogurt, 3 diffferent fruit salads, pastries and juices. You can order other breakfast options, including a full English breakfast for an additional cost.
The room was very nice with a king bed, spacious bath with shower and tub.
We look forward to our next visit.
Room Tip: We were on the 5th floor and it was very quiet. See more room tips
